data.name: Business Heroes: Food Truck Simulation
data.detailed_description:
Get Exclusive Updates


About the Game

While sipping his favourite Earl Grey tea every day, Master Lee reflects on his inability to find a true Business Hero to succeed him. The wealthiest entrepreneur knows the cost of making a wrong choice. Refusing defeat, Master Lee decided to create the ultimate tool to reach every corner of the world. A Business Simulation challenge based on his very first business. And so, Business Heroes: Food Truck Simulation was born.

Take The Plunge

Break out your management and culinary chops as you hit the streets with your new food stand in search of survival, profit, and growth. Improve your product with customer feedback till you discover the best burger recipes to keep them returning for more.

Build a profitable food business and unlock new upgrades, stands and more - all with the satisfaction of delivering delicious burgers exactly how customers like them. No customer taste, budget, or patience is beyond the reach of your range of exotic food stands.

Relish the joy of success as you seize new opportunities to dominate the city's street corners, parks, and financial districts with your food truck business. Hone your business skills in single-player, or get competitive with friends in Multiplayer; either way, experience your food truck dream to your heart's content.

From casual burger truck lovers to strategy players with a fondness for detailed financial reporting, everyone can dig in for a rich and immersive experience.

GAMEPLAY MODES

Fulfill Your Entrepreneurial Dream
Take the entrepreneurial plunge in Career Mode and learn the secrets of successful food truck businesses. With Master Lee as your trusted mentor and adviser, you will discover how to:

  • Hook diverse customers with their perfect burger recipe
  • Offer burgers and drinks at prices customers can't resist
  • Invest in equipment and upgrades to serve customers better
  • Snatch customers from the competition with timely marketing
  • Keep your employees smiling with bonuses and training that improves their skills
  • Respond quickly to weather changes and unexpected events

Sharpen Your Management Skills
Hone your management and strategy skills in Challenge Mode. Beat your best company valuations in Time Challenge Mode or achieve management mastery by being profitable under diverse conditions in Daily Challenge Mode.

Face Off Against the Best
Enter food truck face-offs with friends in Multiplayer/1v1 matchmaking mode. Up to 6 players battle to outsell and outgrow each other in a 30-day food truck showdown in Multiplayer Mode, or engage in a strategic thinking duel with the best in 1v1 Matchmaking Mode*.

*1v1 matchmaking will be included in later updates.

FEATURES:

  • "Easy to learn, hard to master" gameplay inspired by real-world business and marketing strategy

  • Unique business conditions based on varying weather, GDP, and raw material prices in over 12 real cities

  • Almost accurate price simulation in the real-life currency of the chosen city.

  • Equipment and food truck upgrades to serve and satisfy more customers

  • Business expansion across seven city localities (Street Corner, Noisy Playground, Park Central, Big Station, Glamor and Hip Street, National Landmark, and The Finance Hub)

  • Customer targeting based on market segmentation strategy

  • A detailed financial reporting system

  • Simulated economic conditions that test business acumen

  • Multiplayer/1v1 matchmaking mode

In this business simulation, you take all the business decisions at night and watch the result of your choices unfold during the day.

data.short_description: Business Heroes is a delicious blend of classic tycoon games & modern business strategy. Savour the delightful taste of success as you grow a tiny food truck business into a thriving company. Enjoy it alone with bites of real-world challenges or share with friends in a strategy battle for the city.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 4th Generation Intel® Core™ i3 Processors
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
